        protected boolean getMaskTouched(float x0,
                                 float y0)
        test the mask from x0,y0 (top left) to x1,y1 (bottom right) to see if this region has already been visited
        Parameters:
        x0 - left
        y0 - top
        Returns:
        true if all the pixels in this region are zero.

      • takeImageSampleBlock

        protected ColorRGB takeImageSampleBlock(float x0,
                                        float y0,
                                        float x1,
                                        float y1)
        Sample the pixels from x0,y0 (top left) to x1,y1 (bottom right) and average the color.
        Parameters:
        x0 - top left x
        y0 - top left y
        x1 - bottom right x
        y1 - bottom right y
        Returns:
        the average color in the region. if nothing is sampled, return white.

      • floodFillBlob

        protected void floodFillBlob(int colorIndex,
                             float x,
                             float y,
                             Writer osw)
                      throws IOException
        queue-based flood fill begining from the starting location
        Parameters:
        colorIndex - red,green,blue,etc
        x - starting location
        y - starting location
        osw - where to write the flood fill instructions
        Throws:
        IOException - failure to write

      • convert

        public boolean convert(TransformedImage img,

                throws IOException
        create horizontal lines across the image. Raise and lower the pen to darken the appropriate areas
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
